goals__remit:
Styrenics Circular Solutions (SCS) was founded by leading styrenics manufacturers united by a common goal: to transform the styrenics industry by un-leashing polystyrene’s value as a fully and infinitely recyclable material. To this aim SCS is encouraging the engagement of the entire value chain – from partners in supply chain to converters, recyclers, brand owners, retailers and trade associations. 
 
For more information please visit: http://styrenics-circular-solutions.com/
relevant_communication:
Styrenics Circular Solutions (SCS) has created three separate working groups to heighten the efficiency and reach of SCS activities: 
 
 
Working Group 1 | Technology 
Objectives: Identify and accelerate the deployment of the most effective recycling technologies 
 
 
Working Group 2 | Waste Streams & Sorting Technologies 
Objectives: Facilitate the delivery of polystyrene post-consumer waste feedstock to the optimal recycling technologies; and build up an SCS knowledge base through studies, cooperation with regional partners and learning from related initiatives 
 
 
Working Group 3 | Communication 
Objectives: Raise the profile of Styrenics Circular Solutions and its commitment among key stakeholders, including policymakers, authorities and brand owners
